name: Treehouse of Horror VI
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Swartzwelder, Steve Tompkins, David X. Cohen, Dan Greaney (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: A freak lightning storm causes giant advertising mascots to come to life, Groundskeeper Willie dies and swears revenge on the kids in their dreams, and Homer accidentally finds himself trapped in another dimension.
